content.raw: Ah, there were fairly extensive changes to rfblaster.py in the Python 3 fork, this will make things a little tricky to merge, but I'll see what I can do (in like 2 weeks), especially since I want to get the Python 3 changes into a lab for testing and you guys are appropriate victims for this :p
